source:
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Blaste's fraught expression is in stark contrast to the tranquil surroundings.
target:
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_SEQ_00Règle spéciale:  synchronisation de quête
Blasté semble chercher quelqu'un.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_TODO_00<tab>Trouver la femme aux cheveux châtains

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_000<tab>Ah, we meet again. The familiar who was with Charmion, yes? My apologies if I seem a little distracted, but I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_000<tab>Tiens, te revoilà<var 1D /var>? Tu tombes bien, j'aurais un petit service à te demander.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_001<tab>Oh, I don't believe we've met. As much as I would like to engage in more meaningful conversation, I am actually in the midst of searching for someone.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_001<tab>Tiens, tu tombes bien, familier<var 1D /var>! J'aurais un petit service à te demander.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_002<tab>It's my mentor, who taught me practically everything I know. Now, she has relinquished her role and is ready to make her final journey. But before she does, there is an important matter I must convey to her.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_002<tab>Il faut que je retrouve une amie qui vient de quitter ses fonctions d'observatrice. C'est elle qui m'a tout appris. J'ai une nouvelle importante à lui transmettre avant qu'elle s'en aille.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_003<tab>The last concept in her care─a beautiful, winged creature─has been approved for life on Etheirys!
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_003<tab>La dernière créature volante dont elle avait la charge a enfin été approuvée et sera bientôt envoyée sur Ætherys.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_004<tab>Please, will you help me look for her? There is a strong chance you will find her at Philomythes Notos. Her most distinguishing feature is her chestnut-colored hair, tied into a single, flowing lock, much like a monoceros's tail.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_004<tab>Pourrais-tu m'aider à chercher mon amie<var 1D /var>? C'est une femme aux cheveux châtains attachés derrière la tête. Va voir dans le sud de Philomythès Notos.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_010<tab>I have sent a familiar of my own to the north to look for my mentor. I would be very grateful if you could search elsewhere, starting with Philomythes Notos.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_010<tab>J'ai envoyé mon propre familier chercher mon amie du côté nord de Philomythès Notos. Va voir au sud, s'il te plaît.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_021<tab>Ah, yes. I had a feeling she might say that. As I have told her, my decision has been made.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_021<tab>C'est gentil à elle, mais je ne retournerai pas à l'Anagnorisis.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_A1_000_001<tab>But what about that winged creature? It was a success!
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_A1_000_002<tab>Well, she can't say I didn't try.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_022<tab>Glad tidings, to be certain, but my work is done. This news was more than sufficient, and I thank you for it.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_022<tab>J'ai rempli ma mission ici. Savoir qu'elle me cherchait me suffit.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_023<tab>Nothing can deter me from my chosen course, and I must join my predecessors in the hereafter. Tell Blaste to name the creature as she pleases... And that I wish her every happiness.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_023<tab>Je dois retourner à la planète. Dis à Blasté que je lui laisse l'honneur de décider du nom de la nouvelle créature volante dont j'avais la charge.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BROWNHAIRWOMAN04287_000_024<tab>Now, our brief encounter has reached its end. Farewell.
TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_030<tab>She's not with you...did you at least find her?

TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_031<tab>I should've known nothing would sway her. All I can do is hope she finds blessed respite in the aetherial sea...and that we may one day be reunited in another life.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_031<tab>Je vois. Alors, elle compte retourner à la planète... Ça m'attriste, mais j'espère qu'elle se reposera bien au cœur de la mer des étoiles et que nous nous recroiserons dans une autre vie.

source: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_032<tab>Until then, I will carry on her legacy, beginning with the naming of the creature she cared for so dearly. I think I shall name it after her. That way, she will live on through her work...forever.
target: TEXT_AKTKZG012_04287_BLASTE_000_032<tab>Je choisirai un nom pour cette créature volante en me basant sur celui de mon amie. Merci pour ton aide.
